Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, you are too close!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Four nuclear bombs launch from the aircraft—'}
{3: 'Watanabe pushes the lever to its limit as his aircraft struggles to turn. However...'}
{3: 'The missiles are in contact with the Punishing core...'}
{3: 'A giant fireball appears miles above Earth from the four nuclear explosions...'}
{3: 'In another corner of the space station...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Unfortunately, your fate is not in your own hands.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gabriel takes his eyes away from the broken body of Selena in his arms.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Target Construct successfully captured. Both the corruption rate and functionality are in line with our estimations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Roland and I will be waiting for you at the planned destination.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You know he's not going to last...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After the conversation, Gabriel puts Selena into the launch capsule before squeezing himself in.'}
{3: "Gabriel adjusts Selena's pose, then closes the gate and presses the launch button."}
{3: 'The Eternal Engine, the last uninfected train on Earth, is cruising through the desert.'}
{3: 'Ahead of its track, fire rains down the navy blue sky as the comets fall from space.'}
{3: 'The burning red light has painted the exterior of the train scarlet.'}
{3: 'On the lavish balcony outside one of its carts, two figures watch as this calamity descends from the sky...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'That beacon will attract all kinds of attention. People will take advantage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "The scouts returned. It's as you expected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Also, a new face showed up in the Commoner Carriage...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Don\'t mind it. I\'ll have "him" keep an eye out.'}
{2: '???', 3: "What's done is done. We have to get our leverage before others make their moves."}
